 2022-00992022-02-10TC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActAeronautics Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Regulations (Training Programs)
PrecisRegulations amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (TRAINING PROGRAMS) in order to require air operators and private operators to incorporate additional and/or supplemental training specifications to ensure that critical aviation safety updates and modifications to ground or flight training programs are implemented by all affected operators within specific timeframes.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0017 Publication Date: 2022-03-02
AttachmentsAttachment
